description: Strength is a measure of your character's physical power. Higher strength makes it easier for you to land melee attacks, break free from grabs, and perform feats of raw power.
Dexterity is a measure of your character's agility, coordination, and skill in using your hand. Dexterity improves your character's ability to land ranged attacks or perform feats requiring finesse.
Constitution is a measure of your character's physical health and vitality. Constitution increases your health and resistance to sickness.
Athletics is a measure of your character's fitness, flexibility, and agility. Athletics increases your energy and movement speed.
Intelligence is a measure of your character's mental capacity and ability to learn. Intelligence increases the amount of XP your character gains or helps you perform tasks requiring mental acumen.
Tenacity is a measure of your character's mental fortitude and determination. Tenacity increases your sanity, allows you to power through pain, and deal with traumatic scenes and stress.
Perception is a measure of your character's general awareness of your surroundings and the keenness of your senses. Perception allows you to spot, hear, or detect something.
Charisma is a measure of your character's charm around others. Charisma allows you to interact with other humans in a more successful manner.
